_source.text: 30 frame per second "PROGRESSIVE SCAN" (rather than interlaced) captures 30 ACTUAL frames per second, and really only looks a little bit better than film as far as the motion is concerned, but there's more resolution per frame so it looks sharper and you can pause it without getting that weird jittery effect you see when you pause VHS tapes.
